name: GRIDHAMDAnswerOptionsVSQ11
title: GRID-HAMD Answer Options ValueSet
description: ValueSet including Q11 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.

concept.display: Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
Mild (some distress) and Absent or clinically insignificant
Mild (some distress) and Much of the time
Mild (some distress) and Almost all the time
Moderate (marked distress, may cause some impairment in functioning) and Occasional
Moderate (marked distress, may cause some impairment in functioning) and Much of the time
Moderate (marked distress, may cause some impairment in functioning)  and Almost all the time
Severe (significant impairment in functioning)  and Occasional
Severe (significant impairment in functioning) and Much of the time
Severe (significant impairment in functioning) and almost all of the time
Very Severe (incapacitating) and Much off the time
Very Severe (incapacitating) and Almost all of the time
